message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I understand your concern, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $140?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $135?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. How about we meet at $138?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $132?
I'm not willing to go much lower, Bob. How about we meet at $136?
I'm still not convinced. Would you be willing to go down to $129?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. How about we meet at $131?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $130, but no higher. Would you accept this offer?
